card_text: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters$NThis card gains 500 ATK and DEF for each "Deskbot" card on the field. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Deskbot Jet" per turn, and only once that turn.$N●You can target 1 "Deskbot" card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Deskbot" monster from your Deck.$N●You can target 1 "Deskbot" card you control and 1 face-up card on the field; destroy them.
